cast.overview: In post-Sept. 11 Los Angeles, tensions erupt when the lives of a Brentwood housewife, her district attorney husband, a Persian shopkeeper, two cops, a pair of carjackers and a Korean couple converge during a 36-hour period.
cast.title: Crash

details.biography:
Bahar Soomekh (born March 30, 1975) is a Iranian actress and environmental activist. She is best known for her roles in the films Crash and Saw III.

Soomekh began her acting career by guest-starring on several television series including JAG and 24 abd later appeared in a few films, including Crash and Syriana. In 2006, Bahar was noted for her roles in Mission: Impossible III and Saw III. In the next five years, she mostly worked on television, most notably on Day Break from 2006-2007.
details.name: Bahar Soomekh
